title: Dakioko
text:
Hello! I’m Stephen Kioko, a software engineer with a strong passion for machine learning and software development. I specialize in building intelligent systems, crafting data-driven solutions, and creating impactful user experiences.







Skills




Programming Languages: Python, C, C++, C#, Java,
Data Analysis: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, R
Database Management: SQL, MySQL, SQLite
Visualization Tools: Looker Studio, Shiny Dashboard
Spreadsheet Tools: Excel, Google Sheets










Who I am


Designer & developer based in Kenya



I am a technology expert based in Nairobi. I have a strong passion for leveraging technology to solve complex problems. I specialize in software development, data analysis, and technical writing.


My expertise spans multiple programming languages, web development, data visualization, and database management. I thrive on delivering high-quality solutions and continuously exploring new developments in the tech world. Let’s connect and innovate together!









My work


Explore my portfolio to discover the projects I’ve worked on and learn more about my professional journey.



  

  

  

  

  

  

See More

title: Services
text:
University Instruction:





As a seasoned educator, I specialize in teaching programming and related courses at the university level. With a focus on fostering a deep understanding of core concepts, I empower students to excel in their academic pursuits and beyond.









Virtual Assistant Solutions:





Need assistance streamlining your processes? I’m here to help. From crafting comprehensive Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to managing administrative tasks, my virtual assistant services ensure smooth operations for your business or organization.









Exam Compilation Software Installation:





Enhance your educational institution’s efficiency with seamless exam compilation software installation. I specialize in setting up user-friendly platforms tailored to secondary school needs, facilitating smoother exam administration and assessment processes.









Spreadsheet Expertise:





Unlock the full potential of your data with my spreadsheet services. Whether it’s organizing, analyzing, or visualizing data, I leverage advanced spreadsheet techniques to deliver actionable insights and drive informed decision-making.









Data Analysis and Visualization:





Harness the power of Python libraries like Pandas and NumPy for robust data analysis. From data wrangling to statistical analysis, I provide comprehensive solutions to extract meaningful insights from your datasets. Elevate your data storytelling with captivating visualizations created using Matplotlib, Plotly, and Seaborn, transforming complex data into visually engaging narratives that drive understanding and business growth.

title: Projects
text:
Hi , I am Stephen Kioko, a Software Developer & Data Analyst
I am a software developer proficient in Python, C++, and Visual Basic. My expertise extends to data analysis using Python and visualization with Looker Studio. With a background in teaching at the university level, I’ve instructed courses ranging from introductory computer science to specialized topics like computer applications in pharmacy.
Skills:

Programming Languages: Python, C++, Visual Basic
Data Analysis: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn
Database Management: SQL, MySQL, SQLite
Visualization Tools: Looker Studio, Tableau
Spreadsheet Tools: Excel, Google Sheets

title: Portfolio
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure 1.


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()








Figure 1: A line plot on a polar axis
